title: What is the best BTS album to get if you can only buy one? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you can only buy one album, I suggest asking yourself these questions: Are the majority of my favorite BTS songs from one specific album? If that’s the case, choose that album. If not, think of the genres that you like most. If you like hip-hop or more hype-style songs then consider BTS’ earlier albums. If you like more ballad-type songs or pop, check out the LY series and newerWhat kind of concepts do I like? Do you like pretty and soft concepts (like LY: Her) or dark and alternative concepts (like Dark and Wild)?When deciding on one album to buy, I ended up choosing LY: Tear because I love all the songs on the album and I love the concept photos so much 💜 I hope this helps!

Personally I would get Love Yourself: Answer. This album includes most of their very popular songs in the love yourself era. Also, the contents inside are AMAZING. However, this is my personal opinion. I would suggest getting your favourite album of theirs! But don’t worry, whichever album you get it will be AMAZING!
